name: TaxEvasion (Landelin)
description:
Your goal : 

Enter your office dungeon and find your laptop before it's too late ! 

Controls :

Z,Q,S,D or W,A,Q,D to move

Shift to run 

Left click to punch

Mouse control for camera

------------------------ CAUTION :Minimum  Required configuration --------------------

i80286 with at least 16 MHz

1024 Ko RAM

A VGA screen

Mono speaker

Keyboard with at least the keys "z, q, s, d, ctrl, escape"

200 Mo disk capacity

Stable electrical installation

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is a prototype developped  by Landelin
